H0.text: who did vladimir lenin marry. Alexandra Kollontai

H1.text: who did vladimir lenin marry. Rosa Luxemburg

H2.text: who did vladimir lenin marry. Inessa Armand

H3.text: who did vladimir lenin marry. Nadezhda Krupskaya

A4.text: Throughout his adult life, he was in a relationship with Krupskaya, a fellow Marxist whom he married.

A5.text: She was initially posted to Ufa, but persuaded the authorities to move her to Shushenskoye, where she and Lenin married on 10 July 1898.
